original_text: And she gave the savoury meat and the bread, which she had prepared, into the hand of her son Jacob.
korean_text: 자기가 만든 별미와 떡을 자기 아들 야곱의 손에 주니

sentences.original_text: And she gave the savoury meat and the bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 맛있는 고기와 빵을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: into the hand of her son Jacob
